long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An interactive audio equalizer for web browser that implements basic biquad filters utilizing the Web Audio API. There is also a safe limiter at the end of audio chain to prevent clipping. Usage of this extension requires extreme care to prevent damage to speakers/hearing by monitoring gain stages (ex: OS volume, hardware volume, media volume, etc...)
